feed.title: Rodent Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.3.4
entry.content:
• fix: better support for collections
  • feat: experimental support for music
  • fix: added back audio selection (accidentally removed)

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.4.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Native Picture in Picture for iPhone (by clicking on the pip icon - see image below)
  • Background playback with album art

Changes

  • Changed red colors to purple to match the rest of the UI
  • Link to download page when clicking the "downloaded" icon
  • Improved play/pause logic
  • Update download list automatically when when a download is finished
  • Album art for music when closing the app
  • No parsing of the URL on login anymore.

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.4.1
entry.content:
• Next / previous episode buttons
  • Tailscale (VPN) login should now work

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.4.2
entry.content:
Highlights

  • A download queue for downloading multiple items in a row
  • Badges for more information about movies/episodes
  • Keep the screen awake as long as the app is open

Changes

  • Fix formatting for specials seasons
  • Added headers to HLS stream URL
  • More bitrate options
  • Report playback stop on pause
  • Limit the overview text to 140 chars, with an option to expand

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.5.1
entry.content:
Highlights

Both the Android and iOS apps are now available on the respective app store! No more test flight, APKs or betas for those who don't want to deal with that. Expect a bit slower updates through the official channels though.

  • There are now settings for things like auto-rotate and open full screen video immediately. You can find them in the settings screen.
  • Search page now has a native search bar on iOS.
